Package controller

Class AddCustomerFormController

java.lang.Object
controller.AddCustomerFormController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddCustomerFormController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the javafx addcustomerform html class.
